title: Order History and Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to view my order history and track current orders so that I can monitor my purchases and delivery status.
acceptance_criteria: User can access order history from their account dashboard
Orders are sorted by date (most recent first)
Each order displays: order number, date, total amount, status
User can click on an order to view detailed information
Order details show: items, quantities, prices, shipping address
Active orders display real-time tracking information
User can download order invoice as PDF

comments.author: UX Designer
comments.text: Created mockups for order history page. Focus on mobile responsiveness.

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Integrated with shipping provider API for real-time tracking.
